meanings.definition: In the current fashion or style.
meanings.sent1: She dressed modishly for the party, wearing the latest trends.
meanings.sent2: The celebrity was always modish, setting new fashion standards.
meanings.sent3: Even her pet tried to look modish by wearing a tiny bowtie.
meanings.sent4: The city streets transformed into a modish runway during fashion week.
meanings.sent5: The modish display window attracted many curious onlookers.

meanings.sent1: Her modish outfit turned heads wherever she went.
meanings.sent2: The boutique showcased a collection of modish clothing items.
meanings.sent3: The modish sunglasses made him feel like a movie star.
meanings.sent4: The modish decor of the restaurant created a chic ambiance.
meanings.sent5: The modish hairstyle completed her stunning look.
